org.projecthaystack.io

Class HGridFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.projecthaystack.io.HGridFormat

  • public class HGridFormat
extends Object
    HGridFormat models a format used to encode/decode HGrid.
    See Also:
    Project Haystack

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      String mime
      Mime type for the format with no paramters, such as "text/zinc".
      Class reader
      Class of HGridReader used to read this format or null if reading is unavailable.
      Class writer
      Class of HGridWriter used to write this format or null if writing is unavailable.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HGridFormat(String mime, Class reader, Class writer)
      Constructor

    • Field Detail

      • mime

        public final String mime
        Mime type for the format with no paramters, such as "text/zinc". All text formats are assumed to be utf-8.

      • reader

        public final Class reader
        Class of HGridReader used to read this format or null if reading is unavailable.

      • writer

        public final Class writer
        Class of HGridWriter used to write this format or null if writing is unavailable.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HGridFormat

        public HGridFormat(String mime,
                   Class reader,
                   Class writer)
        Constructor

    • Method Detail

      • find

        public static HGridFormat find(String mime,
                               boolean checked)
        Find the HGridFormat for the given mime type. The mime type may contain parameters in which case they are automatically stripped for lookup. Throw a RuntimeException or return null based on checked flag if the mime type is not registered to a format.

      • list

        public static HGridFormat[] list()
        List all registered formats

      • register

        public static void register(HGridFormat format)
        Register a new HGridFormat

      • makeReader

        public HGridReader makeReader(InputStream in)
        Make instance of "reader"; constructor with InputStream is expected.

      • makeWriter

        public HGridWriter makeWriter(OutputStream out)
        Make instance of "writer"; constructor with OutputStream is expected.
